title: Ka tlantu chu a nung tih ka hria
lyrics:
Ka tlantu chu a nung tih ka hria,
Khawvelah ro a rel leh ang,
Chatuan nun min pe thei tih ka hria,
Ropui leh thuneihna a chang.

A nung ka hria, ka Tlantu duh tak,
Khawvelah ro a rel leh ang,
Min pe ngei dawn chatuana nun hlu,
Ropui leh thuneihna a chang.

A thutiam hlen zel fova khanin,
Min tiam thlawn dawn o tih ka hria;
Ka taksa hi ral mah selangin,
Amah ka la hmu dawn si a.

Ka tan hmun min siamsak tih ka hria,
A chennaa cheng ve turin,
Aw, a va mak em min hmangaihna!
A lo kal dawn min hruai turin
